Posts.EditableText: On the sites that I frequent I seem to always see results from IF competitions but I always miss the announcements FOR the competitions.  I realize I could just be an idiot, but where do you all suggest I look for upcoming comps?
Posts.HTML: On the sites that I frequent I seem to always see results from IF competitions but I always miss the announcements FOR the competitions.  I realize I could just be an idiot, but where do you all suggest I look for upcoming comps?

Posts.EditableText: IFComp is the big one: http://www.ifcomp.org/ Try here as well: http://www.intfiction.org/forum/viewfor ... 1e2f376f85

Posts.EditableText: The front page of http://ifwiki.org has an "upcoming events" box, but it sometimes goes without maintenance for long periods
